  • Mailgun

Mailgun

Install Mailgun

In the “Add-ons” tab in your app console click “Install” for the Mailgun add-on. That’s it!

Pricing

With the Mailgun add-on for PHP Fog, you get a free plan that includes:

  • 300 messages per day
  • Real time reports and stats
  • Fully featured account
  • Temporary mailbox storage
  • Premium support

If you need more than that, you can upgrade through Mailgun. Check out their pricing here.

Using MailGun

To use Mailgun with your app check out the Quick Start Guide under the PHP tab.

For more extensive documentation, see the User Manual.
